entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 18.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then increasing to 50 gusting to 70 this afternoon. High 18. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers overnight. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening then becoming northwest 40 gusting to 70 overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 11. POP 60%
